properties.name: Hexanika - Big Data & Cloud Computing
properties.short_description: Big Data and Cloud Computing Solutions
properties.description:
Hexanika is focused on building products and solutions based on Big Data and Cloud Computing technologies. The strategy is to enable clients to harness the power of these technologies to manage enterprise data required for regulatory compliance reporting and customer data analytics. Core solutions include Data Unification & Consolidation Software (SmartJoin), End to end Regulatory Reporting Software for Bank Holding Companies, Implementation Strategy & Architecture, Big Data Analytics, Cloudification of software, Big Data & Cloud Computing Security Solutions.

Hexanika is one of the few early cloud computing providers predominantly focused on banking industry. 

Hexanika's methods are thoughtful, researched, proven, flexible, and aligned with your business culture that drive business performance and sustain constant adaptability and change. Hexanika strive to cater to the client’s business and strategic needs at all times, during change, during growth, during streamlining and continue to focus on delivering incredible results for their business.

Hexanika provide NewSQL & Private cloud services focused on providing solutions for banking sector for their customers and regulatory needs. 

Hexanika's  dedicated team of professionals has a strong leadership with an exposure to global Fortune 500 companies spanning multiple industries. Hexanika's global support model delivers a swift pace and approach ability where our group of highly qualified, skilled and dynamic resources provides advisory services to substantial and diversified clientele.

Hexanika's India Knowledge Excellence Center will enable leveraging the labor and foreign exchange arbitrage to get the cloud and big data work done.
